fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, appear at someone's house, rampaging there. You cannot do this night one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, 8 random non-neutral players have home runs attached to them. When they are visited or die, their home run is collected. You are unaware who has home runs.
- You start the game knowing at least one player who doesn't have a home run.
- When your 8 home runs are collected, you die. It's possible for you to collect home runs.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone without having your home runs collected.
